content:
IWithRegion Interface

Definition

A web app definition allowing new app service plan's region to be set.

In this Article

public interface IWithRegion : Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.Resource.Definition.IDefinitionWithRegion<Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.WebApp.Definition.IWithNewAppServicePlan>
